name: Stage
description: Stage is a gamified SocialFi platform revolutionizing how fans and artists interact. By merging music competitions, prediction markets, and blockchain-powered ownership, Stage creates a dynamic ecosystem where fans earn real rewards and artists gain the tools to monetize their careers like never before. MVP already available on iOS (Android coming soon). $STAGE is a cutting-edge cryptocurrency project designed to revolutionize the digital asset space. The project aims to provide a secure, scalable, and efficient platform for decentralized applications (dApps) and smart contracts. With a focus on enhancing user experience and promoting transparency, $STAGE is poised to become a leading player in the blockchain ecosystem. The project's roadmap outlines key milestones and objectives, ensuring a clear path to success and innovation.
